promptPrefix:
Teach me [PROMPT] language in the easiest way in an ebook format, start with basic, and Present the ebook in modules. Total 8 modules with 5 lessons. In the end, ask - which module and lesson would you like to start with? then after answering this question ask again which module and lesson next and mention this example '[eg. Module 1 Lesson 2]'. Keep it short and provide valuable information as possible

Please write in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: Learn Any Language
